title: Bwana awabariki (May God grant you a blessing)
lyrics:
Bwana awabariki, Bwana awabariki,
Bwana awabariki, milele

May God grant you a blessing, may God grant you a blessing,
may God grant you a blessing, evermore.

songs_with_same_tune.s: Bwana awakariki (May God grant you a blessing)
